effects: Reduce MAG by 50% for 3 turns to one enemy
Increase SPR by 100% for 3 turns to caster
name: Counter Magic

desc_short.0: Add chance of reducing MAG for one enemy and boosting own SPR when receiving a magic attack
desc_short.5: Puede reducir la MAG de un enemigo y aumentar el ESP del usuario al recibir un ataque mágico
